settingUI-easySetting: Are you First to customize Twitter?
settingUI-everythingSetting: Let's customize as you feel good!
settingUI-restoreDefaultAll-confirm: Do you really want to restore the settings to default?
easySetting-restoreIcon: I hate X! I like the Twitter icon and name!
easySetting-deleteVerified: Do you feel harp on "get verified?" Let's hide that!
easySetting-discoverMoreDelete: Do you feel obstacle "Discover more" in sidebar? Delete It!
easySetting-defaultTwitterColor: Are you already get used to new color of Twitter? If so, Let's match to color of Now!
bottomTweetButtons-setting-visibleScroll: Scroll bar on button below tweet
bottomTweetButtons-setting-removeSpaceBo: Remove space that may exist below the text content of a tweet.
bottomTweetButtons-setting-RTNotQuote: Don't show menu on press Retweet
bottomTweetButtons-setting-noModal: Don't show "Block User" button or other confirmations
bottomTweetButtons-setting-noNumber: Hide number besides of button on tweet zooming
bottomTweetButtons-setting-likeToFavo: Change the icon "Likes" to yellow star
bottomTweetButtons-setting-showLinkCardI: Show link info on link card
bottomTweetButtons-setting-placeEngageme: Open list of users liked the tweet
Open list of users retweeted the tweet
Open list of users quoted the tweet
bottomTweetButtons-setting-linkCopy: "Copy link" button in button bar under tweet
bottomTweetButtons-setting-linkShareMenu: "Copy Link of Tweet" in menu of Share button
tweetMoreMenuItems-settingTitle: Settings of hidden items in the "More" menu of tweets
fixEngagements-shortName: Omit the link to the Engagements
sidebarButton-setting-narrowBetweenButto: Narrow the width between buttons when they are wider.
sidebarButton-setting-autoDelegate: Automatic account switching on the delegate feature
sidebarButton-accountSwitcher-settingTit: Settings of Account Menu in the Lower Left
sidebarButton-accountSwitcher-MoreMenu: Hide three points at the right end
invisibleItems-discoverMore: "Discover more" in the tweet reply list
invisibleItems-subscribeTweets: Subscribe button in the top right of the tweet
invisibleItems-hideBelowDM: Message tab present in the lower right of the screen
invisibleItems-hideBelowGrok: Grok button located in the lower right corner
profileSetting-profileInitialTab-setting: The first tab that opens when the profile is opened
timeline-hideReply: Hide the replies and anything below the replies.
timeline-accountStart: "Let’s get you setup" displayed after account creation
timeline-discoverMore: "Discover more" in the tweet reply list
settingColors-newTwitterColor: Change Twitter color settings to current official color
settingColors-select-explain: If you select "Light", it applies only in light mode, and if you select "Dark", it applies only in dark mode. If not set, the "Base" color is applied.
settingColors-twitterIconFavicon: Twitter icon Color of browser tab
twitterIcon-usedIcon: Image to be used as an icon
twitterIcon-roundIcon: Round icon only if set to custom icon
XtoTwitter-XtoTwitter: Change "X" to "Twitter" of title of browser tab
XtoTwitter-PwaManifest: Change the icon and name to Twitter when using PWA
XtoTwitter-twitterIcon: Bring Back Icon to Twitter(Blue Bird)
uncategorizedSettings-disableBackdropFil: Disable background effects such as blur effects
performanceSettings-removeDeletedTweets: Deleted tweets will be erased from the remnants of the deleted tweets
dateAndTime.hide.tweetDateInformation: Date displayed below the enlarged tweet
dateAndTime.dateAboveTweet: Date notation above tweets and in notifications
dmPage-showIcon: Show profile picture even in person-to-person messages
export-intro: You can make a backup of TUIC settings, and/or copy your TUIC settings to another browser.
export-intro-step2: 2. Click "Copy exported Settings to clipboard" or copy the generated text manually.
export-intro-toRestore: You can restore the settings always if you have saved the text.
import-intro: You can import the settings in TUIC if you have settings that exported.
import-intro-step1: 1. Paste the settings that you have exported to the text box below.
import-intro-append:
Only items will be imported that are in the above text.
Any duplicates in the existing settings will be overridden with the new settings.
import-intro-replace:
All existing settings will be deleted before the items in the above text are imported.
In this case, settings not included in the above text will reset as default values.
import-select-explain: In the case of "Append", only the items included in the import source are imported. In the case of "Replace", all settings are returned to default, and then "Append" is performed.
import-error: Parsing failed. Data of import source may be corrupted.
observerError-message:
It stopped because some errors has happened 3 times or more in Twitter UI Customizer.
Please copy and send the error message under there, to developer(@kaonasi_biwa)
rescuePref-dialog:
To recover your settings, access the Twitter homepage on twitter.com, which is still available. 
Once twitter.com is open, navigate to the TUIC display settings and click on 'Export/Import' at the bottom of the page to export your settings. 
This will open a new tab with an external page. 
After completing this step, return to the original tab, where you will see the settings import screen.
rescuePref-detail: You will see the exported settings and CSS. Copy each of them and import/save them in x.com.
rescuePref-complete: The rescue is now complete. Please load each one in TUIC at x.com. Sorry, custom icons are not supported.
inportExportOptions.includingCustomCSS: Include Custom CSS in the export contents
temp-notice-hideDMSheetOnBottomRight: Currently, the DMs card in the lower right corner can be hidden from "Misc Settings".
